text: Cun nisonae ʙar musrikoni (ahli Makka ʙar rost ʙudani pajomʙarii Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam) nozil sud, ʙa'ze az ʙuzurgonason guftand, ki mo imon nameovarem, to on goh, ki har ci ʙa pajomʙaroni Alloh doda suda, ʙa mo niz doda savad. Bigu «Alloh donotar ast, ki risolati xudro dar kuco qaror dihad. Ba zudi ʙa gunahgoron ʙa cazoi makre, ki mekardand, az coniʙi Alloh dar cahannam xorivu azoʙi saxte xohad rasid!»
